pullrequest.title: [Citadel] Add SemanticPose class with implementation for Link.

content.raw: I'm passing `Pose3d::Zero` with the name of the link, because it has zero pose offset from itself. this comes from merging the pose resolution logic for links, joints, and frames, which are vertices in the graph, with collisions, visuals, etc. that aren't in the graph, and by necessity need to offset from a named frame
content.html: I'm passing Pose3d::Zero with the name of the link, because it has zero pose offset from itself. this comes from merging the pose resolution logic for links, joints, and frames, which are vertices in the graph, with collisions, visuals, etc. that aren't in the graph, and by necessity need to offset from a named frame
